panels.description: Estado das conexões com o database
panels.title: CONNECTION STATE

panels.description: Conexões com o database em timeout
panels.title: DB CONNECTION TIMEOUT

targets.expr: sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", area="heap"})* 100 / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", area="heap"})

sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", area="nonheap"})* 100 / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", area="nonheap"})

panels.description: Total de requisições no último minuto
panels.title: TOTAL REQUESTS

panels.description: Número de erros da familia 500 nos últimos 5 minutos
panels.title: ERROR FAMILY 500

panels.description: Tempo de resposta da API no último minuto
panels.title: RESPONSE TIME

panels.description: Taxa de erros nos últimos 5 minutos

targets.expr: sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", status=~"5..", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[5m])) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[5m]))

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", status=~"4..", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[5m])) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[5m]))

panels.title: ERROR RATE

panels.description: Número de requisições por endpoint no último minuto
panels.title: REQUEST COUNT

panels.description: Duração média de requisições no último minuto

targets.expr: rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", status="200", uri="/cursos"}[5m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", status="200", uri="/cursos"}[5m])

rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", status="200", uri="/cursos/{id}"}[5m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="$job", status="200", uri="/cursos/{id}"}[5m])

panels.title: AVERAGE REQUEST DURATION
